string-array.name: illinois_descriptions
string-array.item: Even the pizza dough is named after Chicago!
Because “Shallow-Dish” pizza just doesn’t have the same ring to it, and Chicago-style is code for more carbs.
“What’s really in a hot dog?” Enter the Chicago-style hotdog, a delicacy piled so high with artery-clogging goodness that you’ll be too distracted to contemplate life’s big questions.
Midwestern logic: “They’re delicious on their own, so let’s throw them in one pan, bake it and make magic!”
This is technically an Eastern European dish, but Illinois is the “Chicago-style” state.
